subtitle: Warm salad gives an interesting combination of textures but it must be served immediately.

method.text: Peel and segment half the quantity of oranges. Gently break up the cluster of hon-shimeji mushrooms.
Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add aII mushrooms and cook for 5 min. Add sesame seeds and grated rind and juice of remaining orange. Stir in orange segments and spinach. Heat through before serving.

title: Warm exotic mushroom salad
